Post-Match Reflections: Pakistan captain Babar Azam: 'It’s good for us – we needed this win.'
Canada captain Saad Bin Zafar: 'It was a bit disappointing we wanted to play a positive brand of cricket.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan now need India to register a big win on Wednesday against USA, with both sides two from two so far.
Others: Pakistan’s net run rate has improved to 0.191 and they are third behind India and USA, who have both won two games. The latter has a net run rate of 0.626, which Pakistan will be heavily focused on in the coming games.
Pakistan’s Mohammad Amir is Player of the Match
The left-hander skies Gordon to Bajwa, who is on as a sub fielder, at backward point and falls for 4 from 6 faced.
The right-hander moves to 52* from 52 deliveries with a turn for three through midwicket. Pakistan reach 103-2 at the end of the 17th; 4 needed from 18.
